TextBody:
Hello,

Can you please let me know what you would like to remove from the server to free up some space?
I will request server access and try to clean the space.
While I do that, do I have your permission to delete shadows older than 30 days?

Kind regards
__________________
Andrei Pop | Technical Support Engineer
Netwrix Endpoint Protector

This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.
